bibl.title: The Meanings of ἤτοι in the Papyri.
bibl.note: A. ἤτοι = "or". - B. ἤτοι = ὃς / ἣ / ὃ καί [e.g. στρατηγὸς ἤτοι ἐξάκτωρ]. - C. ἤτοι = "and especially". - Pp. 247-250: Addendum. List of Exactores and Ex-exactores. Replaces the list in P. Amst. I, pp. 168-171.
bibl.seg: SIJPESTEIJN P.J., The Meanings of ἤτοι in the Papyri.

A. ἤτοι = "or". - B. ἤτοι = ὃς / ἣ / ὃ καί [e.g. στρατηγὸς ἤτοι ἐξάκτωρ]. - C. ἤτοι = "and especially". - Pp. 247-250: Addendum. List of Exactores and Ex-exactores. Replaces the list in P. Amst. I, pp. 168-171.
